page.title: 09OUR HOBBIES-1
page.content:
My hobby is BMXing.In the morning at 11'o clock I go up to Brentor.I go to the Scrutineer and he checks my bike.Then I go and sign in at the tent.At 12.30 there is freestyling and at 1.00 they start racing.When they call your name you go up to the starting gate.They say riders ready, pedals ready,go. They go over the speedjump round two corners, over the double whoops, round a corner and over a big jump and pedal to the end.You have three goes .At about 4.30 you go home, may be with a trophy or not.I have won two trophies and came 4th in the championships. NEIL SARGENT.
One of my hobbies is Sailing .I sail on the river Tamer ,at Weir Quay.I belong to Weir Quay Sailing Club.I sail a Mirror dinghy.
